yapanaya saha kilinochchi disthrikka athuluwa palath palana aayathana wisi dekak sandaha eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya idiripath kala nama yojana therim bhara niladharin wisin prathikshepa kirima anumatha nokarana bawa mathiwarana komasariswaraya wenuwen peni sitimin niyojya solisitar janaral shawindra pranandu mahatha abhiyachanadhikaranayata eeye (23) danwiya.ema namayojana pathra prathikshepa wi aththe palath palana mathiwarana panathe 31 wani waganthiya yatathe namayojana pathrayak prathikshepa kala yuthu hethuwak matha nowana bawath pranandu mahatha kiya.yapanaya saha kilinochchi disthrikkawala palath palana aayathana daha nawayak sandahada, yatinuwara , nawagaththegama saha wennappuwa pradeshiya sabha sandahada e.ja.ni.sa idiripath kala namayojana prathikshepa wimata erehiwa gonu kara thibu pethsam adhikaranaya hamuwe eeye wibhagayata ganuna awasthawedi pranandu mahatha ese kiya.abhiyachanadhikarana sabhapathi sathya hettiye saha winisuru upali aberathna mahathwarun hamuwe me pethsam wibhagayata ganini.

“mata meka mehema liyanna sidda wechcha eka gana dukayi.oya hondatama dannawa mama oyata aadare withthiya.oya alabola kanna aasa withthiya danagaththe oyage yaluwangen.ithin ekayi hamadama mama oyata ewwama genath dunne.mama oyata kochchara nam liyum dunnada.oya ewwa gannawa witharayi mata uththarayak denne naha ne.mata nam thawath me widihata oya nisa rasthiyadu wenna ba.mama kusum ekka yalu wenna thiranaya kala.eyath ape aart klas ekemayi.oya ithin bayo nisa wenna athi ochchara gas.kamak na.hamadema hondata wenne.kusum oyata wada suduyi, kondeth ina gawata withara digayi.anika eya alabola walata wada ganan adu pan kek kanna aasa.eekama kochchara deyakda.api dennama aart nisa ekama kampas ekata yanna puluwan kiyala kusum kiyanawa.oya nam dosthara nalawa danatamath belle dagena neh inne.kusumgeyi mageyi palaweni lamaya hambenna enakota oya dosthara nonek wela inna kiyala prarthana karannam.”

shubha nakathak yanu yami karyayak wenuwen sudasu aakaraye ga්rahayan sthana gathawimak athi wana awasthawa ෙwi.mema awasthawa manushyayata sakas kala nohaki wana athara jyethir ෙwidiya karanu labanne obage katayuththa sa`daha sudasu ga්raha sthana gatha wimak ha sesu thathwayan yahapath wana awasthawak soya dimayi.thawa duratath mese pahadili kala hakiyi.ෙwila`dama sa`daha nakath sadimedi ema ෙwilawata udawana lagnaya dhanasthanaya ,karma sthanaya menma ayasthanaya balawathwa thibiya yuthuyi.meyata amatharawa dinaye shubhathawaya ,horaewi shubhathawaya menma udawa athi nakatha da katayuththa sa`daha mema adala pudagalayata da galapedayi wimasiya yuthuyi.
